exe.name: exe
exe.description: A role command that toggles the night execution ability of the *Interrogator*. If the ability is on by the end of the night, the detained player will be dealt an *unstoppable* attack.
exe.usage: `.exe` - Toggles the decision. Off by default.

i.name: i
i.description: A role command which allows a player to speak to a specific channel anonymously.

lastwill.name: lastwill
lastwill.description: A general command used to write a personal Last Will, which is displayed upon the player's death. Some roles can hinder the Last Will from being displayed or modify its content.
lastwill.usage:
`.lastwill <view/read>` to read your Last Will.
`.lastwill <rewrite/overwrite> <text>` to overwrite your Last Will with the provided text.
`.lastwill <write/add> <text>` to add text to your Last Will from a new line.
`.lastwill <clear/delete>` to delete your Last Will.

reveal.name: reveal
reveal.description: A role command that when used at daytime publicly announces and confirms the user's role.

whisper.name: whisper
whisper.description: A general command used to send private messages to a specific player. Whispers cannot be used at nighttime and while you have the __Mute__ effect. Whispers become Letters when sent from the Mafia/Cult channel, which bypasses all restrictions.

dict.name: dict
dict.description: Displays an explanation for a specific ingame keyword or community-made term.
dict.usage:
`.dict` for the full list of words available for lookup.
`.dict <word>` to see the explanation of the word. Case insensitive, space omittable.

role.name: role
role.description: Displays detailed information of a specific role. Shorthand names (aliases) are permitted. Case insensitive, space omittable.
role.usage:
`.role <rolename> [desc]` to get a copyable version of the role card's description text.
`.role <rolename> info` to get the classic ability and attribute lists for the role.
`.role <rolename> meta` to get ingame meta data about the role.
`.role <rolename> inv` to get investigation results on this role. (Not working yet)
`.role <rolename> card` to get the URL for the role card. (Not working yet)
`.role <rolename> wiki` to get the wiki link for the role. (Not working yet)

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Displays a list of all roles in a specific category, and provides additional information if requested. Acronyms are permitted.
roles.usage:
`.rl <faction> [subcategory]` to filter roles by faction and category.
`.roles <unique/u> [faction]` to display all unique roles.
`.roles <factional/f>` to see all factions/factional roles.
`.roles all` to display all roles in a single list.
(Append `info` to your command to display additional information about the query.)

alert.name: alert
alert.description: Toggles notifications for new games. You will not be pinged by this for any other cause.

gmt.name: gmt
gmt.description: Outputs the current timestamp in GMT format, which is the primary timezone for the game.

help.name: help
help.usage:
`.help` to display the full list of commands.
`.help <command>` to display detailed information about a specific command.

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Pings the bot and returns the duration it took for the bot to answer. If the bot does not respond to other commands, use this to check if the bot is still running normally.

signups.name: signups
signups.description: Displays how many people are signed up for the game ("Passengers"), and how many people have chosen to spectate respectively.
signups.usage:
`.signups` to view numbers.
`.signups name` to display a list of passenger names.

time.name: time
time.description: Displays what the current phase is and the amount of time left before the next time phase.

70alternativeaccounts.name: 70alternativeaccounts
70alternativeaccounts.description: Reveal your true power and assert your dominance! They will never find your main!

calloutpost.name: calloutpost
calloutpost.description: Type up an angry call out post and submit it on a social media!

8ball.name: 8ball
8ball.description: Provides a random yes-or-no answer when asked a question.

catfact.name: catfact
catfact.description: Displays a random fact about felines, provided by [Cat Facts API](https://catfact.ninja/).

coin.name: coin
coin.description: Flips a coin, which will land on either heads or tails.

ligma.name: ligma
ligma.type: What the fuck? Seriously, what the fuck?
ligma.description: You are currently looking up help for a shitty unfunny joke that people might've found slightly humorous for roughly two days before it was abandoned. Let that sink in. How does it feel to be this pathetic? This command will reinforce just how stupid you are when you use it.
ligma.usage: Your intelligence must be somehow worse than a rock if you can't operate a basic command such as this. Actually, you probably can't even read this.

rps.name: rps
rps.description: Simulates a game of Rock, Paper and Scissors against the bot.
